name: Run Ralphie
description:
Ralphie is just an EPIC Arcade Game about a poor lonely rodent that just wants to be run wild. In order to be survive he will need to escape quick sand, jump over saw blades, fend off giant bat creatures, and deal with rubber tires falling from the sky!

OBJECTIVES-
* Run!
* Don't Hit the Blades
* Be careful when interacting with the "Physics" objects (They move based on gravity!)
* Dont Die
* Jump over the obstacles
* Navigate the "Tunnels"
* Run some more!
* Kill the enemies!

FEATURES -

* See how far up the leaderboards you can climb by running through our constantly evolving world
* Multiple characters to unlock
* Frequent Updates to provide fresh new content several times a week
* Watch out for quicksand, moving tiles, and other unique obstacles
* One-Hand - Tap to Jump
* This app is FREE!
